title: Godrej 331 L Frost Free Double Door 3 Star Refrigerator  (Silver Meadow, R T Eon 331P 3.4 Silver Meadow)

product_specification.In The Box:
1 Refrigerator
User Manual and Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's. Call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance Or text "Hi" to 9321665511 on WhatsApp
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on product and 10 Years Warranty on Compressor from Godrej
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Refrigerator comes with a 10 yr warranty on compressor and 1 yr warranty on all other parts (except bulb, glass and add on plastic parts) from the date of purchase, against defective material and good workmanship.In the warranty period beyond the first year of purchase , only the compressor will be provided free of cost.However , the appliance will be repaired on payment of necessary charges.
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty:
Incase, the appliance or any part is subjected to neglect, abuse or misuse , tampering, alteration or any other acts of God, or damage by rodents and insects
Warranty automatically expires after the stipulated period of original purchase even if the refrigerator was not in use for anytime for whatsoever reasons
Warranty does not cover/is not applicable
In case of original number (Serial no., sticker) is removed obliterated or altered from the machine or cabinet
The company is not responsible for any damage caused to the appliances and shall not be liable for any consequential loss or compensation nor refund of purchase price or replacement

product_description.Intelligent Operations: To efficiently and quickly remove frost, this Godrej refrigerator has an intelligent automated defrosting system that takes into account the last defrost time, how much time the last defrost took, frost accumulation, ambient temperature, door openings, etc.
product_description.Patented Cool Shower Technology: This kitchen appliance comes with toughened glass shelves that have built-in vents. These vents are located directly above your food and let the cold circulate more effectively for better cooling.

review:
Dear all,
The product was good as they mentioned in the app.the guy who came for delivery is pathetic guy..Do not have patience to talk with a customer..My house is on 1st floor and the fridge was suppose to be delivered there.He was showing his face for this and I arranged a local man to support him to carry out the task..
I feel the Flipkart should be much careful in choosing their transport partners.

Apart from that Flipkart service in ultimate...

Very good product.

Pro
1. Elegant design
2. Full tamper proof glass front door
3. very spacious and well-thought interiors
4. Nice cooling.
5. Exceeding my expectations in terms of well-thought ice removal design trays (might be common now-a-days but I got impressed)

Cons:
No handle because of that door gets dirty very often. The door has an extended edge to open and close though.
Once you get used to it. no issues post that.

Very good fully decent look and fast and effective cooling 100% original
Consumes very less electricity
Go for it
10 years of compressor warranty is very good
On time delivery and installation
Thank u flipkart.

The refrigerator is spacious and good looking. Storage in the door compartment is less than in other refrigerators. The freezer cannot be locked when you lock the lower compartment which can be problematic during transportation. Have been using the fridge for 3 days and so far cooling is good. Value for money.
Delivery was bang on time and delivery staff was polite and cooperative. Item delivered without a scratch and unpacked by the delivery team so that I could check out the piece. Demo was...

Hi everyone we know godrej is trusted brand in India, expecially in electronic products godrej have to improve some build quality that's it, apart from everything is okay but not superior compare to other brands, my request to godrej they must constrate on service it's very very important in urban areas

Pros: good brand
Cons: I received only 2 middle trey
This is not acceptable because image showing 3 trey

It has very good finishing (door design), plus one thing have noticed that if i compare this with my previous Godrej refrigerator it had few advantages
Pros:
1. door size is very thick, so from long term point of view its good as we keep big bottles on door pocket containers it will easily bare its weight
2. Individual cooling vary option for both doors
3. Capacity is good + plus cooling system is awesome....., have noticed the freshness of vegetables remains as it is , previuosly it use to get dry after few days

Cons:
Only 3 sections are present inside for lower door section, they should provide 1 more dividing plastic layer which user might use it for optional purpose


Over all -
1. its very awesome product
2. delivery guys are very much helpful (5 star for them)
3. flipkart services (5 star) - you no need to call or mail them up , they keep on following things until you are done with final demo session

I appreciate and admire of FLIPKART support and services compare to any other e-Commerce site services. The product "Godrej Refrigerator 343Ltrs is really best and specious . The services of Godrej is excellent I never ever expected such great services from Godrej ane Flipkart. I booked and next day I got my order delivered. Thanks Flipkart.

I bought this product last week, Flipkart delivery was on schedule & technician visit was scheduled the very next day. The product is very in terms of looks & design. The interior is quite spacious & the cooling is very fast. I compared refrigerators of other companies & could not find one that could match the price on this make & model. Godrej brand lives up to its expectations. A very good product at this price range.

I have ordered this product on Monday 24th April 2017 at 4:11 p.m & got the product on 25th April 2017 at 10 a.m. Ticket raised with Godrej on the same day for Demo & Installation. Product is intact, no damage delivered.
Even delivery persons are too helpful & they place that 60 KG product to 1st floor & took the existing one back.Delivered in Good condition, Free demo & Installation has been done today.
Even the price I have got from Flipkart which is less than any Distributor price. Overal...

Do not buy any white goods from flipkart would be my advice. They are selling factory discarded defective products. The fridge we received is making big noise from compressor. We wanted to return this defective noisy product but Godrej it seems is hand in glove with Flipkart. They told us that the noise level should not exceed 60 decibels and fridge is emitting 56 db. 60 decibels itself is a very high value in the house. And that is deliberately set this way so that defects can be covered up.
In a nutshell flipkart is a willing conduit for sale of defective, factory rejected products and by companies wishing not to accept their mistakes.
Do not buy this fridge or any other from flipkart.

Within 8 months of purchase this fridge got damaged.. then Godrej service person checked and told us to buy external stabilizer as inbuilt one can't withstand more loads.. better buy a fridge without built-in stabilizer and install a new stabilizer..

Good

The product was delivered within 1 day after booked. The packing and delivery was neat and have no comment on their part.
Regarding the product, it made of cheap plastic. The storage panel in the door is not quite conformable to hold multiple water bottles.
The place where the compressor is placed is not sealed. Also there are wires, visibly seen around that open area. If you have rats / cockroach in your house, you should be very cautious.
There is no issue with the cooling (both the compartments). Though all the racks were mentioned as "Toughened Glass", the beading around the glass is of very cheap plastic. Not sure if they can hold 150kg (as advertised).
The entire fridge doesn't looks like a 343L fridge (may be I replaced this fridge from 420L).
There is no issues so far with the fridge performance.
Also Flipkart and the seller did a good job in delivering on-time. The same with courier service too.
The installation guy just came to un-pack the cover and switched on the fridge. He did nothing more that.
Great product. Only a bit of concern is no light in freezer door, but its not a big deal. Quick chill, led lights, and much more. By the way quick delivery by flipkart.
Gud

No major functionality issues with the product, however the overall experience of buying a refrigerator online was pathetic. Issue started when we first opened the door panel of this fridge. The design layout which we saw in the advertisement on Flipkart was different. We called up flipkart helpdesk and they arranged for technician visit from godrej. Seller and godrej both confirmed that the product and its model both are manufactured as per the design specifications and there is nothing that they can do. They were right on there part. It was Flipkart fault to post pictures which were miss leading. Later Flipkart did gave us an option to return the item however, we decided to keep the refrigerator as we got the same u through hefty discount offered on flipkart. Now we have got accustomed to the layout of fridge.
